address.docs:
**, int**: The I²C address of the driver. Defaults to `0x40`.

*See also: [ES7243E](https://esphome.io/components/audio_adc/es7243e.html#configuration-variables)*

i2c_id.docs:
The ID of the [I²C bus](https://esphome.io/components/i2c.html#i2c) the ES7243e is connected to.

*See also: [ES7243E](https://esphome.io/components/audio_adc/es7243e.html#configuration-variables)*

mic_gain.docs:
**, enum**: The gain applied to the ADC microphones. One of `0DB`, `3DB`, `6DB`, `9DB`, `12DB`, `15DB`, `18DB`, `21DB`, `24DB`, `27DB`, `30DB`, `33DB`, `34.5DB`, `36DB`, or `37.5DB`. Defaults to `24DB`.

*See also: [ES7243E](https://esphome.io/components/audio_adc/es7243e.html#configuration-variables)*
